overview: You can now manage GitHub Teams from a dedicated page in Settings, instead of the left-hand navigation menu. This change streamlines the navigation and makes other important features easier to find.

detailed_explanation.title: Overview
bullets: You can now manage GitHub Teams from a dedicated page in Settings, instead of the left-hand navigation menu. This change streamlines the navigation and makes other important features easier to find.

detailed_explanation.title: What’s new
bullets: “Teams” is no longer in the left-hand navigation menu.
All team management has moved to a new “Settings → Teams” page.
You’ll see a dismissible banner letting you know where to find Teams the next time you look for it.

detailed_explanation.title: How to provide feedback
bullets: We want to know what you think. Join the community discussion to share your thoughts or ask questions!

caveats: This change streamlines the navigation and makes other important features easier to find.
